PrivacyViolationsSection.title: Google pays fines for privacy violations. Internxt protects your privacy.
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: Google may be secure, but it's a nightmare for your privacy. Switch to Internxt for full security for your files, videos, and photos. With Internxt, nobody but you can access your files, not even us.

descriptions: On December 31, 2021, France's data protection authority CNIL fined Google €90 million for making it harder for users to refuse cookies, a practice that supported the company's advertising and tracking-based revenue model.
The Spanish data protection authority fined Google for violating GDPR by passing identifying information of people who requested deletion to third parties without consent.

In 2025, the French data protection authority, CNIL, fined Google again for displaying advertisements between Gmail users' emails and for placing cookies during account creation without valid consent from French users.

The Swedish Data Protection Authority imposed a fine on Google for right-to-be-forgotten violations. Google was fined in Sweden for failing to remove search results that people requested to be deleted, exposing the identities of those requesting privacy.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Why you need a private Google Drive alternative
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: What Google demonstrates in security fails in terms of privacy. For full privacy, get total security combined with zero-knowledge encryption from Internxt.

descriptions: Google Drive and other cloud services may scan or analyze your files. At Internxt, there are no trackers, no AI scanning, and no hidden backdoors. Internxt can't read your files, so your photos, documents, and videos remain private. You have full control over your cloud.

Google manages encryption keys on its servers, giving them total control of your data. As a result, storing your files with Google poses a huge risk for your privacy, as Google could access your content, photos, or videos at any time.

With Google, your name, email address, websites you visit, and other activities are all monitored, analyzed, and used to build a detailed profile of you and profit from your data. With Google, you and your data become the product.

VersusSection.title: Internxt vs {{competitor}}
VersusSection.description: Internxt offers unparalleled security with features that Google Drive can't match, such as zero-knowledge, post-quantum encryption, and protection from hackers.

features.title: Open source
features.description: Internxt's code is open for everyone to examine and ensure its security via our GitHub. This transparency guarantees that no vulnerabilities are hidden.

features.title: Zero-knowledge encryption
features.description: Your data is encrypted on the client side, guaranteeing that only you can access it.

features.title: Audited & compliant
features.description: Internxt has been externally audited and complies with GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, and SOC 2.

features.title: Lifetime plans
features.description: Avoid repeated subscriptions with a one-time payment for plans up to 5TB. Access our services forever for {{percentage}}% off.

competitorTable.title: Google Drive: What about your privacy?

features.title: Proprietary software
features.description: Google keeps its source code hidden from the public. With no transparency, there is no way to know for sure how Google handles or protects your data.

features.title: Encrypted by Google
features.description: As Google holds the encryption keys, they can theoretically decrypt and access the files if they receive a legal request (such as a subpoena).

features.title: Compliance fines
features.description: Google has a record of regulatory fines for failing to protect customer data.

features.title: Subscription based
features.description: Only offers monthly or annual subscriptions with a maximum storage of 2TB.

WhyBestAlternativeSection.title: Why Internxt is the best Google Drive alternative
WhyBestAlternativeSection.description: Internxt Drive offers a comprehensive suite of products designed to give you back control of your online privacy.

descriptions:
Internxt Drive comes with post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption, so nobody but you can access your files. Get encrypted cloud storage and backups for your photos, videos, and files. 

 Plus, encrypted backups and password-protected file sharing offer maximum protection against ransomware and data breaches.

All paid plans also include Internxt Antivirus for increased protection against the increasing threats we face online. 

  Run full or custom scans from the Internxt app to defend against malware, phishing, and ransomware, and clean and protect your device from data loss or breaches.

Get our ultra-fast, unlimited VPN for up to 5 locations to encrypt and secure your connection with our private VPN. 

  Encrypt your traffic to prevent external spying on your connection, which could leak your personal information, and enjoy total privacy when surfing online.

Internxt Cleaner boosts your device performance and health by removing junk or duplicate files from your computer. 

   Free up storage, improve device speeds, and protect your privacy by deleting unwanted files with a click of a button.

Internxt Meet offers fully private video calls powered by post-quantum cryptography, ensuring your meetings are secure, confidential, and free from trackers. 

   Host and join video calls with friends, family, or teammates in complete privacy, free from external companies monitoring your chats.

Available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile, Internxt lets you take total control of your cloud storage by accessing your cloud from anywhere, on any device. 

  For advanced users, Internxt offers support for WebDAV, Rclone, and NAS, offering everything you need to manage your files in total privacy.

freePlanCard.description: Get 1GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

CtaSection2.title: The best alternative to Drive is Internxt
CtaSection2.description: Internxt gives you full private encryption by default and a full privacy suite to keep your data and files secure online.

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure and private Google Drive alternative?
answer: Yes, Internxt uses post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption that guarantees nobody but you can view your files. Google Drive manages the encryption keys on its own servers, meaning it could access your files or give access to the government or law enforcement.
Additional features such as VPN, Antivirus, Device Cleaner, Dark Web Monitor, Meet, and Mail also offer you additional protection from hackers and data breaches.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard encryption, post-quantum encryption algorithms are built to resist powerful quantum attacks, making PQE a more secure alternative to Google Drive.
This cryptography method is used by Internxt to ensure that your lifetime cloud storage plan protects you against future cybersecurity threats and is available for all plans at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, making it a GDPR compliant cloud storage solution that follows strict laws to ensure your data and privacy are protected.

faq.question: Is Google Drive more expensive than Internxt?
answer: With your exclusive {{percentage}}% discount, all our plans are cheaper than Google's pricing options currently available, with the benefit of offering many more features and privacy than Google Drive.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you have any more questions, requests, or need assistance, you can contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from the settings of your Internxt account if you need to add more storage. Or purchase a new plan at internxt.com/pricing with your current Internxt account, and your storage will be automatically stacked.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc). You can also pay via PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
